parsing_result:
# Checking the Battery Level

After turning the camera on, check the battery level in the display.

Battery level is shown as follows:

!Battery Level Display

| Indicator        | Description                                      |
|------------------|--------------------------------------------------|
| !Partially Discharged | Battery partially discharged.                    |
| !80% Full             | Battery about 80% full.                         |
| !60% Full             | Battery about 60% full.                         |
| !40% Full             | Battery about 40% full.                         |
| !20% Full             | Battery about 20% full.                         |
| !Low Battery          | Low battery. Charge as soon as possible.        |
| !Exhausted            | Battery exhausted. Turn camera off and recharge battery. |
